attributes.action: Declare, and enforce, a no fly zone for all seabirds over all land above the high tide mark
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Sea birds, especially the common gull, have taken to infesting our cities, towns, villiages, and countryside. They spread disease and displace our smaller land birds, attack humans, and cause extensive damage to vehicle paintwork through their ammonia rich guano.
I propose that the feeding of all sea birds be made a criminal offence, that a yearly cull be organised by councils, and that all protection for these creatures be removed more than 100m inland from our coastline.
